entry.title: $1850 // Newly Renovated Apartment Near Uptown Manhattan! (NO BROKER'S FEE)
entry.content:
Rachel Y | New York |

2037 2nd AveNew York, NY 10029

$1850.00 / Month

For more information and to apply visit:

https://rental.turbotenant.com/properties/87078

Description:

Beautiful, comfortable and spacious apartment in Uptown Manhattan. NEWLY RENOVATED one-bedroom apartment with hardwood floors, one bathroom, BRAND NEW stainless steel appliances, granite counter-top kitchen, and closets. Located on the third floor. ALSO, plenty of street parking. Located near many shopping areas, restaurants, train stations, and more!--- MUST have 700+ credit score with at least an $85,000 annual income. --- NO BROKER'S FEE

Details:

  • Type: APARTMENT
  • Bedrooms: 1
  • Bathrooms: 1
  • Pets: CATS, SMALL DOGS
  • Square Feet: 450 sq ft

Terms:

  • Deposit: $1850.00
  • Min.Lease: ONE YEAR
  • Available:
